2D2.F.summary: Scandinavian Investment Group A/S invests in real estate properties in Denmark. It also invests in and operates portfolio of companies in Scandinavia. The company was founded in 1908 and is based in Herlev, Denmark.

SIG.CO.summary: Scandinavian Investment Group A/S invests in real estate properties in Denmark. It also invests in and operates portfolio of companies in Scandinavia. The company was founded in 1908 and is based in Herlev, Denmark.
